TAU_COSINE_DEVIATION.rule: F5-INV-04: max cosine distance between target and actual trajectory
TAU_COSINE_DEVIATION.derivation: SEED VALUE — CALIBRATE on reference corpus. Default 0.3.

TAU_EUCLIDEAN_DEVIATION.rule: F5-INV-04: max euclidean distance in R14

TAU_DECAY_TOLERANCE.rule: F5-INV-07: max deviation between theoretical I(t) and measured I(t)

DEAD_ZONE_MIN_LENGTH.rule: F5-INV-05: minimum length for dead zone detection

DEAD_ZONE_Z_THRESHOLD.rule: Dead zone = Z plateau with lambda_eff approximately 0

WEIGHT_EMOTION.derivation: Architecte Supreme decision: emotion = 60% of final verdict.

WEIGHT_QUALITY.derivation: Architecte Supreme decision: quality = 40% of final verdict.

SATURATION_CAPACITY_C.rule: OMEGA V4.4: Z_max = C. If Z approaches C then burnout.

COMPOSITE_PASS_THRESHOLD.rule: ForgeResult verdict = PASS if composite >= threshold
